Articles.Content:
I recently bought a receiver for xbox controllers and have been trying to get it to work with ksp. 

this is the driver I downloaded [https://github.com/d235j/360Controller/releases/tag/v0.13.1-unofficial](https://github.com/d235j/360Controller/releases/tag/v0.13.1-unofficial) 

and this [http://www.amazon.ca/HDE-Wireless-Receiver-Xbox360-Controller/dp/B0096PLB9O/ref=cm_cr_pr_product_top](https://www.amazon.ca/HDE-Wireless-Receiver-Xbox360-Controller/dp/B0096PLB9O/ref=cm_cr_pr_product_top) 

is what I bought. the control pane for 360 controllers finds the input correctly but when i try to use within ksp nothing happens.

edit: works well with Race the Sun.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-02T14:29:46Z" title="04/02/2015 02:29  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 2, 2015</time> by Kurbis**
Have you set up the controller for KSP in the Input Settings? Make sure you click the axis buttons when binding you thumb sticks.
yes I used the axis buttons.
